tool_description: Generates properly formatted shipping labels with carrier-specific layouts, barcodes, and required addressing information.

sender_name.description: Sender's full name or company name

recipient_name.description: Recipient's full name or company name

tracking_number.description: Unique tracking number for the shipment

error_messages: Unsupported carrier: Use one of [ups, fedex, usps, dhl].
Invalid service type: Service type not supported by the selected carrier.
Missing required information: All sender and recipient details must be provided.
Invalid tracking number: Tracking number format is not valid for the selected carrier.
Address formatting error: Addresses must be properly formatted and complete.
usage: Provide carrier, service_type, complete sender and recipient information, tracking_number, and package_weight. Optionally add reference_number and special_instructions. Returns formatted label data.

label_data.description: Base64 encoded label image or raw format data
